A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overdone CGI\, corny cliche dialogue and scenes\, over the top comic relief\, eye-rolling rescues\, meaningless side missions\, no overarching story. Very disappointed especially after a well-done film two years ago. Leia's scene should be removed\, casino scene completely removed\, Poe and Hux dialogue in beginning removed\, BB-8 AT-ST scene removed\, and Rose rescue scene of FInn removed.
